thread.title: Train delays between Cardiff and Bridgend
thread.title_full: Train delays between Cardiff and Bridgend | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Train delays between Cardiff and Bridgend
text:
Delays of up to 40 minutes are being reported on Arriva Trains Wales between Cardiff Central and Bridgend due to a fault with the track.
Services will either divert via the Vale of Glamorgan line or terminate at Cardiff Central.
There's no estimate for when a normal service will resume. Also affecting Great Western Railway.Source
Last updated Thu 15 Oct 2015 Travel South Wales Cardiff Bridgend
